In the Create New Discussion Project page you will be able to choose the name, description, priority , logo ,portal users and access type of the new project.

If you select the option "Allow Customer Portal Users", the customer portal users can see the project.

If you select the option "Allow Partner Portal Users", the partner portal users can see the project. 

After that you click on Create to finish creating the project.
